question: Who are the top 5 users with the most interactions having a weight greater than 5?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:INTERACTED]->(:User)
WHERE r.weight > 5
WITH u, count(r) AS interactions
ORDER BY interactions DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN u

question: List the top 5 users having the most interactions with a specific key in 'INTERACTED' relationship.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:INTERACTED]->(:User)
WHERE r.key = 'specific_key'
WITH u, count(r) AS interactions
ORDER BY interactions DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN u.label, interactions

question: Which 3 users have the largest size and a color of '#3CB371'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)
WHERE u.color = '#3CB371' AND u.size IS NOT NULL
RETURN u
ORDER BY u.size DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Show the top 5 users who have interacted with users having a color of '#FF4500'.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:INTERACTED]->(v:User {color: '#FF4500'})
WITH u, count{(u)-[:INTERACTED]->(v)} AS interactions
ORDER BY interactions DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN u

question: Find the top 3 users interacted with by 'sarahp.bsky.social'.

RETURN interactedUser
ORDER BY count{(u)-[:INTERACTED]->(interactedUser)} DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List all interactions where the original weight (ogWeight) is greater than the current weight.

question: What are the most common interaction weights among users who have interacted with more than two different users?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:INTERACTED]->(:User)
WITH u, r.weight AS weight, count(DISTINCT r) AS interactions
WHERE interactions > 2
RETURN weight, count(weight) AS frequency
ORDER BY frequency DESC

question: What are the top 5 interactions with the largest area difference between interacting users?

ORDER BY areaDifference DESC
RETURN u1.label AS User1, u2.label AS User2, r.weight AS InteractionWeight, areaDifference
LIMIT 5

ORDER BY q.createdAt ASC
LIMIT 3

question: Which user has posted the highest number of questions?

ORDER BY num_questions DESC
LIMIT 1

question: List the first 3 tags that appear most frequently across all questions.

question: What are the tags of questions that have more than 10 upVotes and were asked by users with a reputation over 100000?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WHERE q.upVotes > 10 AND u.reputation > 100000
RETURN t.name

question: Which questions have a link containing 'apollo' and have been answered?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.link CONTAINS 'apollo' AND q.answered = true
RETURN q

question: Provide the titles and links of questions that were asked by users with an image link containing 'googleusercontent' and have more than 3 favorites.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.image CONTAINS 'googleusercontent' AND q.favorites > 3
RETURN q.title AS Title, q.link AS Link

question: Which questions were asked by the same user more than once and have been tagged with 'aws-lambda'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'aws-lambda'})
WITH u, q, count(q) AS questions_asked
WHERE questions_asked > 1
RETURN u, collect(q) AS repeated_questions

question: List the tags of questions asked by users with a reputation under 500 that have been answered.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WHERE u.reputation < 500 AND q.answered = true
RETURN t.name

question: What are the most common tags for questions that have been asked by users with a display name containing 'Le'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WHERE u.display_name CONTAINS 'Le'
RETURN t.name, count(q) AS question_count
ORDER BY question_count DESC

question: Which questions have been tagged with 'graphql-subscriptions' and have a score greater than 5?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'graphql-subscriptions'})
WHERE q.score > 5
RETURN q

question: Which questions with more than 5 favorites were asked by users who have an image link ending in '.com'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE q.favorites > 5 AND u.image ENDS WITH '.com'
RETURN q

question: Which questions have a createdAt date in 2020 and were asked by users with a reputation over 100000?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE q.createdAt >= datetime('2020-01-01T00:00:00Z') AND q.createdAt < datetime('2021-01-01T00:00:00Z')
  AND u.reputation > 100000
RETURN q

question: What are the top 3 questions by upVotes that were also tagged with 'graphql-js'?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'graphql-js'})
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.upVotes DESC
LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 questions with the most upVotes?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.upVotes DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which questions were asked by users with a reputation above 100?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.reputation > 100
RETURN q

question: Which users have asked questions tagged with 'angular'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'angular'})
RETURN u

question: What are the top 5 most recent questions asked in the system?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5

question: List all questions that have more than 5 downVotes.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.downVotes > 5
RETURN q

question: Which tags are associated with questions that have a negative score?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WHERE q.score < 0
RETURN t.name

question: Find all users who have asked a question with no upVotes or downVotes.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE q.upVotes = 0 AND q.downVotes = 0
RETURN u

question: List the top 5 questions with the most favorites that were asked by users with a reputation under 50000.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.reputation < 50000
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.favorites DESC
LIMIT 5

question: List all users who asked questions that have a title containing 'Apollo' and their corresponding tags.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WHERE q.title CONTAINS 'Apollo'
RETURN u, collect(t.name) AS Tags

question: Which questions have been asked by users who have asked more than 20 questions?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE exists {
  MATCH (u)-[:ASKED]->()
  WITH count{(u)-[:ASKED]->()} AS questionsCount
  WHERE questionsCount > 20
}
RETURN q

question: What are the titles and tags of questions that have a score of zero and were asked by a user with a reputation over 100000?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WHERE q.score = 0 AND u.reputation > 100000
RETURN q.title AS QuestionTitle, collect(t.name) AS Tags

question: List the questions that were asked by users with a reputation exactly 420137.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User {reputation: 420137})-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
RETURN q

question: Which users with a reputation over 100000 asked questions that have been answered?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.reputation > 100000 AND q.answered = true
RETURN u

question: List all questions with a score of 0 and their associated tags.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WHERE q.score = 0
RETURN q, collect(t.name) AS Tags

question: Which questions with more than 5 downVotes were asked by users with a reputation under 1000?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE q.downVotes > 5 AND u.reputation < 1000
RETURN q

question: List the top 5 users by reputation who have asked questions tagged with 'apollo'.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'apollo'})
RETURN u.display_name, u.reputation
ORDER BY u.reputation DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which questions have a text containing 'Internal server error' and have been tagged with 'graphql'?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'graphql'})
WHERE q.text CONTAINS 'Internal server error'

question: Provide the titles and links of questions asked by users with a display name containing 'Le' and a reputation over 10000.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.display_name CONTAINS 'Le' AND u.reputation > 10000

question: Which questions have a score of -1 and were asked by users with a display name starting with 'A'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE q.score = -1 AND u.display_name STARTS WITH 'A'
RETURN q

question: List all questions that have been answered, have more than 5 favorites, and were asked in 2020.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE q.answered = true AND q.favorites > 5 AND q.createdAt >= datetime('2020-01-01T00:00:00Z') AND q.createdAt < datetime('2021-01-01T00:00:00Z')
RETURN q

question: What are the titles of questions that have a text containing 'error' and were asked by users with an image link?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE q.text CONTAINS 'error' AND u.image IS NOT NULL
RETURN q.title

question: Which questions tagged with 'aws-lambda' have a score greater than 0 and were asked by users with a reputation over 50000?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'aws-lambda'})
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q)
WHERE q.score > 0 AND u.reputation > 50000

question: List the questions that have been tagged with 'aws-lambda' and have a creation date in 2020.

MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'aws-lambda'})
WHERE q.createdAt >= datetime('2020-01-01T00:00:00Z') AND q.createdAt < datetime('2021-01-01T00:00:00Z')

question: What are the most common tags for questions that have more than 5 downVotes?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WHERE q.downVotes > 5
RETURN t.name, count(t) AS frequency
ORDER BY frequency DESC

question: Which questions have more than 10 favorites and were asked by users with a reputation less than 5000?

question: Provide the links to the top 5 questions asked by users with a reputation under 1000.

question: What are the creation dates of questions that have been answered and have a score greater than 10?

question: Which questions have been asked by users with the highest reputation and have a link containing 'stackoverflow'?

LIMIT 1

question: Find the top 3 questions that were asked on a weekend.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE apoc.date.format(apoc.date.parse(q.createdAt, 'ms', "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'"), 'ms', 'E') IN ['Sat', 'Sun']
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 5 tags that appear in more than one question.

RETURN t.name
ORDER BY questionCount DESC
LIMIT 5

cypher:

WHERE q.createdAt >= datetime('2020-06-01T00:00:00Z') AND q.createdAt < datetime('2020-07-01T00:00:00Z')
RETURN t.name, count(q) AS questionCount
ORDER BY questionCount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which 3 users have the highest rate of answered questions?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WITH u, count(q) AS totalQuestions, sum(CASE WHEN q.answered = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS answeredQuestions
WHERE totalQuestions > 0
RETURN u.display_name, u.id, u.reputation, (toFloat(answeredQuestions) / totalQuestions) AS answerRate
ORDER BY answerRate DESC, totalQuestions DESC
LIMIT 3

WHERE q.createdAt >= '2019-01-01T00:00:00Z' AND q.createdAt < '2020-01-01T00:00:00Z'
RETURN count(q) AS NumberOfQuestions

question: Which 5 questions have titles containing the word 'error'?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.title CONTAINS 'error'
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Find the top 3 questions with the most complex text content.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q
ORDER BY size(split(q.text, ' ')) DESC
LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 questions tagged with 'aws-lambda'?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'aws-lambda'})
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.score DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which questions have been answered and have more than 2 upVotes?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.answered = true AND q.upVotes > 2
RETURN q

question: Show the first 3 questions that have been answered and have more than 5 favorites.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.answered = true AND q.favorites > 5
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt
LIMIT 3

question: What are the first 3 questions that have been downvoted at least 5 times?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.downVotes >= 5
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 questions with the most upVotes that were created in 2020.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.createdAt >= datetime('2020-01-01T00:00:00Z') AND q.createdAt <= datetime('2020-12-31T23:59:59Z')
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.upVotes DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which user asked the question titled 'Playground is not loading with apollo-server-lambda'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question {title: 'Playground is not loading with apollo-server-lambda'})
RETURN u

question: Find all questions tagged 'react-apollo' that have not been answered.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'react-apollo'})
WHERE q.answered = FALSE

question: What are the top 3 most recent questions asked by users with a reputation over 100?
cypher:

WHERE u.reputation > 100
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List all questions that have 'GraphQL' mentioned in their text and are tagged with 'angular'.
cypher:

WHERE q.text CONTAINS 'GraphQL' AND t.name = 'angular'

question: Which questions were asked by users with an image link containing 'googleusercontent'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.image CONTAINS 'googleusercontent'
RETURN q

question: List the top 5 most favorited questions.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.favorites DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the first 3 questions that were created on '2020-06-05' and have a score below zero?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.createdAt = datetime('2020-06-05T00:00:00Z') AND q.score < 0
RETURN q

LIMIT 3

question: Which questions have a title containing 'Apollo' and were created before 2020?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.title CONTAINS 'Apollo' AND q.createdAt < datetime('2020-01-01T00:00:00Z')

question: Find all questions with more than 3 downVotes and tagged with 'node.js'.

question: What are the first 3 questions that have a score of zero and no favorites?

question: List the top 5 users by reputation who have asked a question about 'GraphQL'.

LIMIT 5

question: Which user with the display name 'Stzl' asked a question with 'bad request' in the title?

question: Find all questions with a 'createdAt' date in 2019 and exactly 0 upVotes.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.createdAt >= '2019-01-01T00:00:00Z' AND q.createdAt <= '2019-12-31T23:59:59Z' AND q.upVotes = 0
RETURN q

question: What are the first 3 questions asked by users with a display name starting with 'Alex'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.display_name STARTS WITH 'Alex'
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 questions with the highest number of downVotes.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.downVotes DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which questions were asked by a user with an ID greater than 9000000?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.id > 9000000

question: List the top 5 questions by users who have a link ending in 'alexandre'.
cypher:

WHERE u.link ENDS WITH 'alexandre'
RETURN q

question: What are the first 3 questions asked by the user with a reputation of 65?
cypher:

RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt ASC
LIMIT 3

question: Find all questions tagged with 'aws-lambda' that have a negative score.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag {name: 'aws-lambda'})
WHERE q.score < 0
RETURN q

question: What are the top 5 questions that were asked on a holiday (assuming holidays are January 1st, December 25th)?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE date(q.createdAt).month = 1 AND date(q.createdAt).day = 1 OR
      date(q.createdAt).month = 12 AND date(q.createdAt).day = 25
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5

question: List the first 3 users with the least reputation who have asked a question.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(:Question)
RETURN u
ORDER BY u.reputation ASC
LIMIT 3

question: Find the 5 questions with the most tags.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WITH q, count(t) AS numTags
ORDER BY numTags DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN q

question: Show the first 3 questions that were asked by users with an image link containing 'googleusercontent'.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.image CONTAINS 'googleusercontent'
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt
LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 questions by the number of total votes (upVotes and downVotes combined)?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
RETURN q.id AS QuestionID, q.title AS Title, (q.upVotes + q.downVotes) AS TotalVotes
ORDER BY TotalVotes DESC
LIMIT 5

question: List the 3 questions with the most references to external links in their text.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.text CONTAINS 'http'
RETURN q
ORDER BY size([link IN split(q.text, ' ') WHERE link STARTS WITH 'http']) DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 questions where the user asking has an id less than 5000.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WHERE u.id < 5000
RETURN q
LIMIT 3

question: Show the first 3 questions where the score is exactly zero.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.score = 0
RETURN q

LIMIT 3

question: What are the 5 most recent questions with no favorites?
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE q.favorites = 0

LIMIT 5

question: List the first 3 tags that appear only once across all questions.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Tag)
WHERE size((t)<-[:TAGGED]-(:Question)) = 1
RETURN t.name
LIMIT 3

question: Which 5 users have the most distinct tags for questions they've asked?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)-[:TAGGED]->(t:Tag)
WITH u, count(DISTINCT t) AS distinctTags
ORDER BY distinctTags DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN u.display_name, distinctTags

question: Show the first 3 questions that have been answered and have a score less than zero.

LIMIT 3

question: Show the first 3 questions that have been linked in more than one answer.
cypher:

WHERE exists{(q)<-[:ANSWERS]-(:Answer)}
WITH q, count{(q)<-[:ANSWERS]-(:Answer)} AS answersCount
WHERE answersCount > 1
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt
LIMIT 3

question: Show the first 3 questions that have been linked in more than one answer.
cypher:
MATCH (q:Question)
WHERE exists{(q)<-[:ANSWERS]-(:Answer)}
WITH q, count{(q)<-[:ANSWERS]-(:Answer)} AS answersCount
WHERE answersCount > 1
RETURN q
ORDER BY q.createdAt
LIMIT 3

WHERE q.score > 5

LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 longest titles for questions in the database?

question: Show the first 3 questions where the createdAt date is on a weekend.

question: Identify the top 3 organizations with the most subsidiaries headquartered in a city named 'Seattle'.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(s:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City {name: "Seattle"})
WITH o, count(s) AS subsidiariesCount
ORDER BY subsidiariesCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName, subsidiariesCount

question: List the first 5 industry categories mentioned in the database.
cypher:
MATCH (ic:IndustryCategory)
RETURN ic.name
LIMIT 5

question: Which organizations have more than 100 employees?
cypher:

WHERE o.nbrEmployees > 100
RETURN o

question: What are the first 3 cities located in the United States of America?
cypher:

LIMIT 3

question: Who are the CEOs of the first 3 organizations in the database?

question: List top 5 organizations that have a revenue greater than 100 million.
cypher:

WHERE o.revenue > 100000000
RETURN o

LIMIT 5

LIMIT 3

WHERE o.summary CONTAINS 'Accenture'

cypher:

question: Find the top 3 articles that mention organizations based in 'Seattle'.

question: What are the names of the organizations that have a CEO with a summary mentioning 'Accenture' and a revenue greater than 100 million?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person)
WHERE p.summary CONTAINS 'Accenture' AND o.revenue > 100000000
RETURN o.name

question: List the first 5 organizations that have a CEO with a name mentioned in more than one article.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person)
WHERE EXISTS {
  MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o)
  WITH p, COUNT(a) AS articlesCount
  WHERE articlesCount > 1
  RETURN p
}
RETURN o
LIMIT 5

question: Identify the top 3 organizations that have a subsidiary with the largest number of employees.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(sub:Organization)
WHERE sub.nbrEmployees IS NOT NULL
RETURN o.name AS ParentOrganization, sub.name AS Subsidiary, sub.nbrEmployees AS NumberOfEmployees
ORDER BY sub.nbrEmployees DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which organizations have a CEO who has authored an article with a sentiment score greater than 0.5?
cypher:
MATCH (org:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(ceo:Person)-[:AUTHORED]->(article:Article)
WHERE article.sentiment > 0.5
RETURN org.name AS OrganizationName, ceo.name AS CEOName, article.title AS ArticleTitle, article.sentiment AS SentimentScore

question: List the first 5 organizations that have a supplier headquartered in a city named 'Seattle'.
cypher:

RETURN o
LIMIT 5

question: Find the top 3 organizations that have a CEO with a summary mentioning 'Accenture' and a revenue greater than 50 million.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person)
WHERE p.summary CONTAINS 'Accenture' AND o.revenue > 50000000
RETURN o
ORDER BY o.revenue DESC
LIMIT 3

question: What are the names of the first 3 articles authored by 'James Blackman'?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article {author: "James Blackman"})
RETURN a.title
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 5 organizations that have a CEO with a name mentioned in at least two different articles and a revenue greater than 50 million.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person)<-[:MENTIONS]-(a:Article)
WHERE o.revenue > 50000000
WITH o, p, count(DISTINCT a) AS articlesCount
WHERE articlesCount >= 2
RETURN o
LIMIT 5

question: List the authors who have mentioned more than three different organizations in their articles.

question: List the organizations that have a sentiment score above 0.8 in their latest article mention.

question: Who are the board members of organizations with more than $500 million in revenue?

question: Find the top 3 countries mentioned in articles that have the lowest sentiment scores.
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country)
WITH country, a.sentiment AS sentiment
ORDER BY sentiment ASC
RETURN country.name AS Country, collect(a.title)[..3] AS Top_3_Lowest_Sentiment_Articles
LIMIT 3

question: What are the names of the organizations that have a subsidiary named 'Accenture'?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(s:Organization {name: 'Accenture'})
RETURN o.name

question: List the first 5 organizations with the most number of employees that have a subsidiary.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(:Organization)
WHERE o.nbrEmployees IS NOT NULL
RETURN o
ORDER BY o.nbrEmployees DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which organizations have the most articles mentioning them in 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)<-[:MENTIONS]-(a:Article)
WHERE a.date.year = 2022
RETURN o.name, count(a) AS mentions
ORDER BY mentions DESC

question: Who are the parents of the board members of organizations with revenues over $1 million?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization) WHERE o.revenue > 1000000
MATCH (o)-[:HAS_BOARD_MEMBER]->(bm:Person)
MATCH (bm)-[:HAS_PARENT]->(p:Person)
RETURN bm.name AS BoardMember, p.name AS Parent

question: List the articles mentioning organizations with revenues under $500,000.
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)
WHERE o.revenue < 500000
RETURN a

question: Which organizations have a city location with a summary mentioning 'county seat'?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)
WHERE c.summary CONTAINS 'county seat'
RETURN o

question: What are the names of organizations that are suppliers to those in the telecommunications industry?
List the organizations that have a CEO with the name 'David Correa'.

RETURN o

question: Who are the CEOs of organizations that have been dissolved but mentioned in recent articles?
List the organizations that have more than five categories listed in their industry classification.
cypher:

WITH o, count(c) AS numCategories
WHERE numCategories > 5
RETURN o

question: Which organizations are mentioned in articles with titles containing the word 'security'?

question: What are the countries where organizations with a public status are headquartered?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country)
WHERE o.isPublic = true
RETURN DISTINCT country.name

question: Which organizations have a summary that mentions 'consumer behavior'?
cypher:

RETURN o

question: List the organizations that have been mentioned in articles with a sentiment score of exactly 0.5.

question: Who are the parents of CEOs of organizations that are public?
cypher:
MATCH (org:Organization {isPublic: true})-[:HAS_CEO]->(ceo:Person)
MATCH (ceo)-[:HAS_PARENT]->(parent:Person)
RETURN org.name AS Organization, ceo.name AS CEO, parent.name AS Parent

question: Which organizations have a board member named 'Julie Spellman Sweet'?

RETURN o

question: What are the names of organizations that have been dissolved but still have a CEO listed?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(:Person)
WHERE o.isDissolved = true
RETURN o.name

question: Which organizations have subsidiaries in more than three different countries?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(sub:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country)
WITH o, count(DISTINCT country) AS countriesCount
WHERE countriesCount > 3
RETURN o.name AS Organization, countriesCount

question: List the cities where organizations with more than 500 employees are headquartered.
cypher:

question: Who are the children of CEOs of organizations with a revenue over $1 billion?
cypher:
MATCH (org:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(ceo:Person)-[:HAS_CHILD]->(child:Person)
WHERE org.revenue > 1E9
RETURN ceo.name AS CEOName, child.name AS ChildName

question: Which organizations are headquartered in cities named 'Rome' across different countries?

question: List articles that mention organizations based in countries not in North America.
cypher:

question: Which organizations have more than one industry category?

WITH o, count(ic) AS numCategories
WHERE numCategories > 1

question: What are the names of the top 3 organizations in terms of revenue in the electronics industry?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(c:IndustryCategory {name: "Electronic Products Manufacturers"})
WHERE o.revenue IS NOT NULL
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName, o.revenue AS Revenue
ORDER BY o.revenue DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List all organizations that have a CEO and more than 10 suppliers.

question: List the top 5 countries by number of cities mentioned in the database.

question: Who are the investors of organizations mentioned in articles with a positive sentiment?

question: Name the first 3 organizations that have a CEO and a board member with different nationalities.
cypher:
MATCH (org:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(ceo:Person)-[:BORN_IN]->(ceoCountry:Country),
      (org)-[:HAS_BOARD_MEMBER]->(boardMember:Person)-[:BORN_IN]->(boardMemberCountry:Country)
WHERE ceoCountry.name <> boardMemberCountry.name
RETURN org.name AS Organization, ceo.name AS CEO, ceoCountry.name AS CEO_Country, boardMember.name AS Board_Member, boardMemberCountry.name AS Board_Member_Country
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 organizations that have been competitors for more than 5 years.

question: Which organization has the highest number of employees and is located in a capital city?
cypher:

WHERE EXISTS {
  MATCH (c)-[:IS_CAPITAL_OF]->(:Country)
}
RETURN o
ORDER BY o.nbrEmployees DESC
LIMIT 1

question: Which organizations have a CEO named within the first 5 chunks of an article?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person), (a:Article)-[:HAS_CHUNK]->(c:Chunk)
WHERE p.name IN [c1.text, c2.text, c3.text, c4.text, c5.text]
WITH a, COLLECT(c) AS chunks
WHERE chunks[0].text IS NOT NULL AND chunks[1].text IS NOT NULL AND chunks[2].text IS NOT NULL AND chunks[3].text IS NOT NULL AND chunks[4].text IS NOT NULL
WITH chunks[0] AS c1, chunks[1] AS c2, chunks[2] AS c3, chunks[3] AS c4, chunks[4] AS c5, o
RETURN o

question: Which 3 organizations have changed their CEOs in the last year?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[r:HAS_CEO]->(p1:Person), (o)-[r2:HAS_CEO]->(p2:Person)

RETURN o.name AS Organization, p1.name AS Previous_CEO, p2.name AS Current_CEO
LIMIT 3

question: Who are the top 3 CEOs of tech companies by number of articles mentioning them?

WITH ceo, org
MATCH (article:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(org)
WITH ceo, COUNT(article) AS mentions
ORDER BY mentions DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN ceo.name AS CEOName, mentions

MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o)
RETURN a

question: Which organizations have board members who are also CEOs of other organizations?
Name the organizations that have subsidiaries and are located in cities with a summary mentioning 'county seat'.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(:Organization), (o)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)
WHERE c.summary CONTAINS 'county seat'
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName

question: What is the sentiment of articles authored by 'David Correa' regarding organizations in the tech industry?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article {author: "David Correa"})-[:HAS_CHUNK]->(c:Chunk),
      (a)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(ic:IndustryCategory)
WHERE ic.name CONTAINS "tech"
RETURN a.sentiment, a.title, o.name

question: Which organizations in 'United States of America' have more than 200 employees?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country {name: "United States of America"})
WHERE o.nbrEmployees > 200
RETURN o

question: List the organizations that have 'Julie Spellman Sweet' as an investor.
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Julie Spellman Sweet"})-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(o:Organization)
RETURN o

question: Who are the children of people working in organizations in 'Seattle'?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City {name: "Seattle"})
MATCH (p:Person)-[:WORKS_FOR]->(o)
MATCH (p)-[:HAS_CHILD]->(child:Person)
RETURN p.name AS ParentName, child.name AS ChildName

question: What are the summaries of organizations that have a CEO named 'Julie Spellman Sweet'?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person {name: 'Julie Spellman Sweet'})

question: Identify the organizations that have been mentioned in articles published after 2021-01-01.
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)
WHERE a.date > date('2021-01-01')

question: Which articles have chunks containing the text 'consumer behavior analyses'?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article)-[:HAS_CHUNK]->(c:Chunk)
WHERE c.text CONTAINS 'consumer behavior analyses'
RETURN a

question: List 3 organizations that have their headquarters in a city that is also a capital.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)-[:IS_CAPITAL_OF]->(country:Country)
RETURN o.name AS Organization, c.name AS City, country.name AS Country
LIMIT 3

question: Name the organizations with competitors that have more than 300 employees.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_COMPETITOR]->(competitor:Organization)
WHERE competitor.nbrEmployees > 300
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName, competitor.name AS CompetitorName, competitor.nbrEmployees AS CompetitorEmployees

question: Name the organizations headquartered in cities that are capitals and have more than one industry category.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country)
WHERE exists{(c)-[:IS_CAPITAL_OF]->(country)} AND count{(o)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(:IndustryCategory)} > 1
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName, c.name AS CityName, country.name AS CountryName

question: List the top 5 organizations that are competitors of 'Accenture'.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization {name: "Accenture"})-[:HAS_COMPETITOR]->(competitor:Organization)
RETURN competitor
ORDER BY competitor.name
LIMIT 5

question: Which organizations have a CEO who is also a board member of another organization?

question: Identify the organizations that have a CEO with a summary including 'executive' and are located in a country named 'United States of America'.

question: List the children of CEOs who are mentioned as investors in the database.

RETURN ceo.name AS CEOName, org.name AS OrganizationName, investor.name AS InvestorName, child.name AS ChildName

question: Name the organizations headquartered in 'Rome' that have a public status.

question: Which organizations are competitors and are located in the same country?

RETURN o1.name AS Organization1, o2.name AS Organization2, country.name AS Country

question: List the first 5 organizations that have a CEO with a name mentioned in at least two different articles.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person)
WHERE exists {
  MATCH (a1:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(p)
  WITH p, count(DISTINCT a1) AS articlesCount
  WHERE articlesCount >= 2
  RETURN p
}
RETURN o
LIMIT 5

question: What are the names of 3 industry categories that the most organizations belong to?

question: Which organizations have a CEO who is also a board member in another organization?

question: List the top 3 organizations by the number of articles mentioning them in 2021.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)<-[:MENTIONS]-(a:Article)
WHERE a.date >= date('2021-01-01T00:00:00Z') AND a.date <= date('2021-12-31T23:59:59Z')
RETURN o.name, count(a) AS mentions
ORDER BY mentions DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the names of 3 organizations that are suppliers to technology companies.

question: Name the top 3 articles that discuss organizations with a history of more than 50 years.

question: What are the names of the organizations where the CEOs have the same last name?
cypher:
MATCH (o1:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p1:Person), (o2:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p2:Person)
WHERE p1.name <> p2.name AND last(split(p1.name, " ")) = last(split(p2.name, " "))
RETURN DISTINCT o1.name AS Organization1, o2.name AS Organization2

question: Which 3 countries have organizations that are major players in the electronics industry?

LIMIT 3

question: Name the organizations that have changed their CEO in the past year.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[r:HAS_CEO]->(p1:Person)
WHERE r.startDate >= date({year: date().year - 1})
AND NOT EXISTS {
    (o)-[:HAS_CEO {endDate: r.startDate}]->(p2:Person)
    WHERE p1 <> p2
}
RETURN o.name AS Organization, p1.name AS CurrentCEO

MATCH (o1:Organization)-[:HAS_COMPETITOR]->(o2:Organization)
MATCH (o1)-[:IN_CITY]->(c1:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country)
MATCH (o2)-[:IN_CITY]->(c2:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country)
RETURN o1.name AS Organization, o2.name AS Competitor, country.name AS Country

question: List the names of the first 3 organizations that have a public commitment to diversity and inclusion.

WHERE exists{(o)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(:IndustryCategory {name: "Diversity and Inclusion"})} AND o.isPublic = true
RETURN o.name
LIMIT 3

question: Which 3 organizations have the most subsidiaries in different industries?

WITH o, count(DISTINCT cat) AS distinctIndustries
ORDER BY distinctIndustries DESC
RETURN o.name AS Organization, distinctIndustries
LIMIT 3

question: Name the first 3 organizations that have a CEO who has authored a book on leadership.

question: List the first 3 articles that mention organizations with a significant number of layoffs in the past year.

question: Which 3 organizations have been featured in the most articles about market expansions?

question: Name the top 3 organizations in terms of revenue that are headquartered in countries with developing economies.

question: List the names of 3 organizations that have at least one female board member.

question: Which 3 cities are most frequently cited in articles about urban development?

MATCH (a)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(city:City)

LIMIT 3

question: Name the first 3 organizations that have been involved in mergers in the past 5 years.

question: Name the top 3 countries by number of organizations that have been mentioned in articles related to healthcare.

question: Name the first 3 organizations that have both a CEO and a board member from the same family.

WITH o, count(DISTINCT country) AS numCountries
WHERE numCountries >= 2

question: Which organizations have a parent organization with a higher revenue?
cypher:
MATCH (childOrg:Organization)-[:HAS_PARENT]->(parentOrg:Organization)
WHERE parentOrg.revenue > childOrg.revenue
RETURN childOrg.name AS ChildOrganization, parentOrg.name AS ParentOrganization, parentOrg.revenue AS ParentRevenue, childOrg.revenue AS ChildRevenue

question: List the organizations that have a summary mentioning 'software' and are in the tech industry category.

question: Which organizations have changed their CEO in the last 5 years according to articles?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p1:Person)<-[:MENTIONS]-(a:Article)-[:HAS_CHUNK]->(c:Chunk)
WHERE a.date >= date({years: date().year - 5})
AND EXISTS {
    MATCH (o)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p2:Person)
    WHERE p1 <> p2 AND a.date >= p2.startDate
}
RETURN o.name AS Organization, p1.name AS PreviousCEO, p2.name AS CurrentCEO, a.date AS ChangeDate

question: List the persons who are both investors and board members in the same organization.

RETURN a

question: Which countries are mentioned in the latest 5 articles about organizations in the electronic products industry?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(ic:IndustryCategory {name: "Electronic Products Manufacturers"})
WITH a
ORDER BY a.date DESC
LIMIT 5
MATCH (a)-[:HAS_CHUNK]->(c:Chunk)
MATCH (city:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country)
WHERE c.text CONTAINS country.name
RETURN DISTINCT country.name AS CountryMentioned

question: Name 3 organizations mentioned in articles written by David Correa.
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article {author: "David Correa"})-[:HAS_CHUNK]->(c:Chunk)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName
LIMIT 3

question: Which organizations have more than 500 employees and are located in Seattle?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City {name: "Seattle"})
WHERE o.nbrEmployees > 500
RETURN o

question: What are the names of the first 3 organizations with a motto?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)
WHERE o.motto IS NOT NULL
RETURN o.name
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 suppliers of Accenture.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization {name: "Accenture"})-[:HAS_SUPPLIER]->(supplier:Organization)
RETURN supplier
ORDER BY supplier.name
LIMIT 5

question: Which organizations have a sentiment score higher than 0.8 in their latest article?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:MENTIONS]-(a:Article)
WHERE a.sentiment > 0.8
WITH o, a ORDER BY a.date DESC
RETURN DISTINCT o.name AS Organization, a.title AS ArticleTitle, a.date AS ArticleDate, a.sentiment AS SentimentScore

question: What are the first 3 companies that are competitors of New Energy Group?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization {name: "New Energy Group"})-[:HAS_COMPETITOR]->(competitor:Organization)
RETURN competitor
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 subsidiaries of Accenture.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization {name: "Accenture"})-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(subsidiary:Organization)
RETURN subsidiary
LIMIT 3

question: Who are the children of Julie Spellman Sweet?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Julie Spellman Sweet"})-[:HAS_CHILD]->(child:Person)
RETURN child

question: What are the top 3 most recent articles mentioning Deja vu Security?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization {name: "Deja vu Security"})
RETURN a
ORDER BY a.date DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the countries where the top 5 organizations by revenue are based.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country)
WHERE o.revenue IS NOT NULL
RETURN country.name AS Country, max(o.revenue) AS Revenue
ORDER BY Revenue DESC
LIMIT 5

question: List the organizations that have a subsidiary that was dissolved.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(subsidiary:Organization)
WHERE subsidiary.isDissolved = true
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName, subsidiary.name AS DissolvedSubsidiaryName

question: What are the industry categories for the first 5 organizations with more than 100 employees?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(ic:IndustryCategory)
WHERE o.nbrEmployees > 100
RETURN o.name, ic.name
LIMIT 5

question: Who are the board members of New Energy Group?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization {name: "New Energy Group"})-[:HAS_BOARD_MEMBER]->(p:Person)
RETURN p.name AS BoardMemberName

question: What are the names of the first 5 organizations dissolved and publicly traded?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)
WHERE o.isDissolved = true AND o.isPublic = true
RETURN o.name
ORDER BY o.id
LIMIT 5

question: List the top 3 cities where organizations with a revenue of more than 100 million are located.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)
WHERE o.revenue > 100000000
RETURN c.name, count(o) AS NumberOfOrganizations
ORDER BY NumberOfOrganizations DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which organizations have Julie Spellman Sweet as their CEO?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Julie Spellman Sweet"})-[:HAS_CEO]->(o:Organization)
RETURN o

question: Which organizations are based in cities with a population of more than one million people according to city summaries?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)
WHERE c.summary CONTAINS "population of more than one million"
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName, c.name AS CityName

question: List organizations that have a philanthropic foundation as an investor.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(investor:Organization {name: "Philanthropic Foundation"})
RETURN o

question: Which organizations have a CEO who has authored more than three articles?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person)
WHERE exists {
  MATCH (p)-[:AUTHORED]->(a:Article)
}
WITH o, p, count{(p)-[:AUTHORED]->(a:Article)} AS articlesCount
WHERE articlesCount > 3
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName, p.name AS CEOName, articlesCount

question: List the organizations that have undergone a merger or acquisition according to articles.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)<-[:MENTIONS]-(a:Article)
WHERE a.summary CONTAINS "merger" OR a.summary CONTAINS "acquisition"
RETURN o.name, a.title, a.date

question: Which organizations have a female CEO and are in the healthcare industry category?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person {gender: 'Female'}), (o)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(c:IndustryCategory {name: 'Healthcare'})
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName, p.name AS CEOName

question: List articles that mention organizations headquartered in Seattle.
cypher:
MATCH (a:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City {name: "Seattle"})
RETURN a

question: Which CEOs have led an organization for more than 10 years?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CEO]->(o:Organization)
WHERE r.since IS NOT NULL AND date() - r.since >= duration({years: 10})
RETURN p.name AS CEO_Name, o.name AS Organization_Name, r.since AS Start_Date

question: List the organizations that have more than three competitors.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)
WHERE count{(o)-[:HAS_COMPETITOR]->(:Organization)} > 3
RETURN o

question: Can you name 3 people who are both investors and CEOs of different organizations?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:HAS_CEO]->(org1:Organization), (p)-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(org2:Organization)
WHERE org1.id <> org2.id
RETURN p.name
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 organizations by revenue that are based in Rome.
cypher:

WHERE o.revenue IS NOT NULL
RETURN o

LIMIT 5

question: Which organizations are public and have more than 300 employees?

question: Which organizations have subsidiaries and are located in countries outside the United States?
List the first 3 organizations that have a city as their headquarters and are also public.

LIMIT 3

question: What are the names of the first 3 organizations with the most competitors?
cypher:

WITH o, count{(o)-[:HAS_COMPETITOR]->(:Organization)} AS competitors

LIMIT 3
RETURN o.name AS OrganizationName

question: Who are the first 3 board members of organizations that are public?

question: List the top 3 people who are investors in more than one organization.

question: Which organizations have the highest number of subsidiaries and what are their names?

WITH o, count{(o)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(:Organization)} AS numSubsidiaries

question: Find the top 3 countries with the most cities hosting public organizations.

question: Which countries have cities that are home to more than three organizations?

WHERE exists {

}
WITH country, count{(c)<-[:IN_CITY]-(o:Organization)} AS orgCount

question: Find the top 3 organizations that have subsidiaries in more than one country.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY]->(sub:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country)
WITH o, count(DISTINCT country) AS countries
WHERE countries > 1
RETURN o
ORDER BY countries DESC
LIMIT 3

RETURN investor.name, collect(otherOrgs.name) AS investedOrganizations

question: List the first 3 articles that have chunks containing the text 'consumer behavior'.

question: Which organizations are based in the same city as 'Accenture'?

question: Who are the first 3 people with children also working in the same organization?

}
RETURN p
LIMIT 3

question: What are the names of the first 3 organizations that have ceased operations but are still mentioned in recent articles?

question: List the top 5 organizations by number of employees that are located in a country with 'America' in its name.

question: Identify the first 3 cities mentioned in articles about technology advancements.

WHERE ic.name CONTAINS "Technology"
WITH c, a
ORDER BY a.date DESC
LIMIT 3
MATCH (c)-[:MENTIONS]->(city:City)

question: Which organizations are based in a country other than their CEO's nationality?
cypher:
MATCH (org:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(city:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country),
      (org)-[:HAS_CEO]->(ceo:Person)-[:NATIONALITY]->(ceoCountry:Country)
WHERE NOT country = ceoCountry
RETURN org.name AS OrganizationName, country.name AS CountryName, ceo.name AS CEOName, ceoCountry.name AS CEONationality

question: Name the organizations that have made the most investments in startups.

question: List the cities where the most CEOs of large organizations reside.

question: Which organizations have the most positive sentiment articles mentioning them?

question: List the organizations that have a subsidiary and a supplier in the same country.

      (o)-[:HAS_SUPPLIER]->(supplier:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(city2:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country2:Country)
WHERE country.name = country2.name
RETURN DISTINCT o.name AS Organization, country.name AS Country

question: Which organizations have the most diverse board of directors?

question: Which organizations have a CEO who has authored more than one article?

WHERE articlesCount > 1

question: What are the top 5 entities that have filed the most transactions with a beneficiary in the United Kingdom?
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(b:Entity)
WHERE f.beneficiary_bank_country = "United Kingdom"
WITH e, count(f) AS transactions
ORDER BY transactions DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN e.name, transactions

question: Which 3 filings involved the highest amounts between March 2015 and September 2015?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin_date_format >= '2015-03-01T00:00:00Z' AND f.end_date_format <= '2015-09-30T23:59:59Z'
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Identify the top 3 countries where the originator banks of filings are located.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
RETURN c.name AS Country, count(f) AS Filings
ORDER BY Filings DESC
LIMIT 3

question: What are the first 5 filings with an amount greater than 500,000 USD?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.amount > 500000
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.begin
LIMIT 5

question: List the top 3 originator banks that have initiated filings with beneficiary banks located in Singapore.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(originator:Entity),
      (f)-[:BENEFITS]->(beneficiary:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country {name: "Singapore"})
RETURN originator.name AS OriginatorBank, count(f) AS NumberOfFilings
ORDER BY NumberOfFilings DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which 3 entities have been involved as beneficiaries in the most filings?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)
RETURN e.name, count(f) AS filings_count
ORDER BY filings_count DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Find the top 5 filings by amount where the beneficiary bank's country is 'United Kingdom'.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country {name: 'United Kingdom'})
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the first 3 entities that have filed a transaction where the originator and beneficiary banks are from different countries?
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WHERE f.originator_bank_country IS NOT NULL AND f.beneficiary_bank_country IS NOT NULL
  AND f.originator_bank_country <> f.beneficiary_bank_country
RETURN e
LIMIT 3

question: Identify the top 5 filings where the originator bank's country is 'Singapore' and the beneficiary bank's country is 'United Kingdom'.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.originator_bank_country = 'Singapore' AND f.beneficiary_bank_country = 'United Kingdom'
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.begin DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the top 3 filings with the longest duration between begin and end dates?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin IS NOT NULL AND f.end IS NOT NULL
RETURN f, duration.between(f.begin, f.end) AS Duration
ORDER BY Duration DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Identify the top 5 filings by amount where the beneficiary bank's country is 'Singapore'.

LIMIT 5

question: What are the first 3 filings with a beneficiary bank located in 'Singapore' that have the smallest amounts?
cypher:

question: Which 3 entities have the most relationships with filings where the beneficiary bank country is 'Angola'?
cypher:

question: Which 3 filings have involved entities with the longest relationships based on begin and end dates?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:CONCERNS|:BENEFITS|:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)
WITH f, duration.between(f.begin, f.end) AS relationship_duration
ORDER BY relationship_duration DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which 3 entities have the most filings as originators and are located in 'China'?

question: What are the names of the top 3 originator banks that have initiated the most filings with a beneficiary in 'USA'?

question: List the top 5 originator banks based on the total number of filings they have originated.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(f:Filing)
WITH e, count(f) AS filings_count
ORDER BY filings_count DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN e.name AS Originator_Bank, filings_count

question: Which Entities have filed more than 3 Filings?
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WITH e, count(f) AS filingsCount
WHERE filingsCount > 3
RETURN e

question: Which 3 filings have the largest amounts where the beneficiary bank's country is 'United Kingdom'?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.beneficiary_bank_country = 'United Kingdom'
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 3 filings with the largest number of transactions where the originator bank's country and beneficiary bank's country are different.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.originator_bank_country IS NOT NULL AND f.beneficiary_bank_country IS NOT NULL
  AND f.originator_bank_country <> f.beneficiary_bank_country
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.number DESC
LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 filings by amount in 2015?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin_date_format >= '2015-01-01T00:00:00Z' AND f.end_date_format <= '2015-12-31T23:59:59Z'
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which 3 countries have the most filings where the originator bank is not in the same country as the beneficiary bank?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(o:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(oc:Country),
      (f)-[:BENEFITS]->(b:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(bc:Country)
WHERE oc.code <> bc.code
WITH bc, count(f) AS filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN bc.name AS Country, filingsCount

question: Identify the top 5 entities by the number of filings they filed.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WITH e, count(f) AS filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN e.name, filingsCount

question: What are the names of the top 3 originator banks that have originated the highest amounts in filings?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)
RETURN e.name AS OriginatorBankName, sum(f.amount) AS TotalAmount
ORDER BY TotalAmount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which 3 beneficiary banks have been involved in filings with the highest total amounts?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)
RETURN e.name AS BeneficiaryBank, sum(f.amount) AS TotalAmount
ORDER BY TotalAmount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 3 filings with the highest number of transactions in a single filing.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.number DESC
LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 countries in terms of total amount received by beneficiary banks?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
RETURN c.name AS Country, sum(f.amount) AS TotalAmountReceived
ORDER BY TotalAmountReceived DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which 3 entities have been filed against the most in terms of number of filings?
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)<-[:CONCERNS]-(f:Filing)
RETURN e.name, count(f) AS filings_count
ORDER BY filings_count DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 countries where most originator banks are located based on filings.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
RETURN c.name AS Country, count(f) AS FilingsCount
ORDER BY FilingsCount DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the top 3 filings in terms of amount that occurred in 2016?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin.year = 2016
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which 3 countries have the highest average amounts in filings where they are listed as originator?
cypher:
MATCH (c:Country)<-[:COUNTRY]-(e:Entity)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(f:Filing)
WITH c.name AS country, AVG(f.amount) AS avg_amount
RETURN country, avg_amount
ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Identify the top 5 entities that have originated the most filings.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(f:Filing)
RETURN e, count(f) AS filings_count
ORDER BY filings_count DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the top 5 filings by duration (from 'begin' to 'end')?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin IS NOT NULL AND f.end IS NOT NULL
RETURN f, duration.between(f.begin, f.end) AS Duration
ORDER BY Duration DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which 3 countries have beneficiary banks that have been involved in the highest number of filings?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
RETURN c.name AS Country, count(f) AS Filings
ORDER BY Filings DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 entities that have been concerned in filings the most.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:CONCERNS]->(f:Filing)
RETURN e.name, count(f) AS filings_count
ORDER BY filings_count DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which 3 countries have the most filings where the amount is above 1 million?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:CONCERNS|:BENEFITS|:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
WHERE f.amount > 1000000
RETURN c.name AS Country, count(f) AS FilingsCount
ORDER BY FilingsCount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 filings with the shortest duration between 'begin' and 'end'.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin IS NOT NULL AND f.end IS NOT NULL
RETURN f, duration.between(f.begin, f.end) AS Duration
ORDER BY Duration ASC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the names of the top 3 originator banks that have initiated filings with the most distinct beneficiary banks?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(originator:Entity)
WITH originator, count(DISTINCT f.beneficiary_bank) AS distinct_beneficiaries
ORDER BY distinct_beneficiaries DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN originator.name AS OriginatorBankName, distinct_beneficiaries

question: Identify the top 5 countries by the number of entities filed against.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WITH e, count(f) AS filings
ORDER BY filings DESC
LIMIT 5
MATCH (e)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
RETURN c.name AS Country, filings AS NumberOfFilings

question: Which 3 originator banks have the most filings associated with them?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)
RETURN e.name AS OriginatorBank, count(f) AS NumberOfFilings
ORDER BY NumberOfFilings DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 filings where the originator and beneficiary banks are in the same country.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(o:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(oc:Country),
      (f)-[:BENEFITS]->(b:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(bc:Country)
WHERE oc.code = bc.code
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the top 5 countries in terms of total amount sent by originator banks?
cypher:

RETURN c.name AS Country, sum(f.amount) AS TotalAmountSent
ORDER BY TotalAmountSent DESC

question: Which 3 entities have benefited from the most filings?
cypher:

question: Identify the top 5 entities that have the most connections to countries through the relationship [:COUNTRY].
cypher:

question: Which 3 countries have the most entities with filings related to 'Barclays Bank Plc' as the beneficiary bank?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing {beneficiary_bank: 'Barclays Bank Plc'})-[:CONCERNS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
WITH c, count(e) AS entityCount
ORDER BY entityCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN c.name AS Country, entityCount

question: Find the top 3 Countries based on the number of originating Filings.
cypher:

ORDER BY NumberOfOriginatingFilings DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which countries have entities that have filed more than 5 filings?
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WITH e, count(f) AS filingsCount
WHERE filingsCount > 5
MATCH (e)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
RETURN c.name AS CountryName, count(DISTINCT e) AS EntitiesCount

question: List the top 3 filings with the most complex routing involving multiple transit countries.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(originator:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(originCountry:Country),
      (f)-[:BENEFITS]->(beneficiary:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(beneficiaryCountry:Country)
WHERE originCountry.code <> beneficiaryCountry.code
WITH f, count(DISTINCT originCountry) + count(DISTINCT beneficiaryCountry) AS complexity
ORDER BY complexity DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN f

question: Find the top 5 entities that have originated the most filings with a beneficiary bank in Germany.

LIMIT 5
RETURN e, filingsCount

question: What are the top 3 originator banks by the number of filings with an end date in 2012?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)

cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.originator_bank_country IS NOT NULL AND f.beneficiary_bank_country IS NOT NULL
  AND f.originator_bank_country <> f.beneficiary_bank_country
WITH f.originator_bank_country AS originCountry, f.beneficiary_bank_country AS beneficiaryCountry
MATCH (c:Country)
WHERE c.code IN [originCountry, beneficiaryCountry]
WITH c, count(f) AS filingsCount
RETURN c.name AS CountryName, filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount DESC
LIMIT 5

question: List the top 3 filings with the highest number of entities involved as originators from different sectors.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)
WITH f, count(DISTINCT e) AS numEntities
ORDER BY numEntities DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN f, numEntities

question: Which 5 countries have the highest number of filings where they are both originator and beneficiary in transactions involving multiple currencies?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country),
      (f)-[:BENEFICIARY]->(e)
WHERE f.originator_iso IS NOT NULL AND f.beneficiary_iso IS NOT NULL
  AND f.originator_iso <> f.beneficiary_iso
WITH c, count(f) AS filings_count
ORDER BY filings_count DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN c.name AS Country, filings_count

question: What are the top 3 filings with the highest number of entities involved as originators from the same sector?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f2:Filing)
WITH f, count(e) AS entitiesCount
ORDER BY entitiesCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN f, entitiesCount

question: Show the first 5 filings with the longest duration and involve entities from more than three different countries.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.end IS NOT NULL AND f.begin IS NOT NULL
WITH f, duration.between(f.begin, f.end) AS dur
ORDER BY dur DESC
LIMIT 5
WITH f
MATCH (f)-[:CONCERNS|:BENEFITS|:ORIGINATOR]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
WITH f, count(DISTINCT c) AS countryCount
WHERE countryCount > 3
RETURN f

question: List the top 3 beneficiary banks by the number of filings involving transactions over $2 million.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)
WHERE f.amount > 2000000
RETURN e.name AS BeneficiaryBank, count(f) AS NumberOfFilings
ORDER BY NumberOfFilings DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which 5 countries have the most filings involving entities from more than two different sectors?
cypher:
MATCH (c:Country)<-[:COUNTRY]-(e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WITH c, count(DISTINCT e) AS sectorCount
WHERE sectorCount > 2
RETURN c.name AS Country, count(f) AS FilingsCount
ORDER BY FilingsCount DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Show the top 5 countries with the most filings where they are both originator and beneficiary in transactions involving multiple currencies.

LIMIT 5

question: Show the first 5 filings that involved a change in beneficiary bank during the transaction.

question: List the first 3 filings that involved entities from both Europe and Asia as originators.

question: Show the top 5 entities by the number of filings they are involved in as both originator and beneficiary.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:ORIGINATOR|:BENEFITS]->(f:Filing)
WITH e, count(f) AS filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN e.name AS EntityName, filingsCount

question: List the first 3 filings with the longest duration and involve entities from more than two countries.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:CONCERNS|:ORIGINATOR|:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
WITH f, duration.between(f.begin, f.end) AS dur, collect(DISTINCT c.name) AS countries
WHERE size(countries) > 2
RETURN f.id, f.begin, f.end, dur, countries
ORDER BY dur DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which 5 countries have the highest number of filings with entities as both originator and beneficiary?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(e1:Entity), (f)-[:BENEFITS]->(e2:Entity)
WHERE e1.id = e2.id
WITH e1, count(f) AS filings_count
ORDER BY filings_count DESC
LIMIT 5
MATCH (e1)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
RETURN c.name AS country, filings_count

question: What are the first 3 filings with the highest total number of concerns?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WITH f, count{(f)-[:CONCERNS]->(:Entity)} AS concernsCount
ORDER BY concernsCount DESC
RETURN f
LIMIT 3

question: Show the top 5 filings with the most entities involved as originators from the same country.
cypher:

ORDER BY numEntities DESC
LIMIT 5

question: List the first 3 countries by the number of filings they have as a beneficiary in transactions involving multiple currencies.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)

WITH c, COUNT(f) AS filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount DESC
RETURN c.name AS CountryName, filingsCount
LIMIT 3

question: Which 5 countries have the highest total number of filings as an originator?

LIMIT 5

question: What are the top 3 filings with the most entities listed as originators from different countries?

question: Show the first 5 entities that have filed the most number of transactions involving multiple countries.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WHERE exists {
    MATCH (f)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(origin:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(originCountry:Country),
          (f)-[:BENEFITS]->(benefit:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(benefitCountry:Country)
    WHERE originCountry.code <> benefitCountry.code
}
RETURN e, count(f) AS transactions
ORDER BY transactions DESC
LIMIT 5

question: List the first 3 countries that have the most filings where the originator bank's country is different from the beneficiary bank's country.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.originator_bank_country IS NOT NULL AND f.beneficiary_bank_country IS NOT NULL
  AND f.originator_bank_country <> f.beneficiary_bank_country
WITH f.originator_bank_country AS originCountry, f.beneficiary_bank_country AS beneficiaryCountry
MATCH (c:Country)
WHERE c.code IN [originCountry, beneficiaryCountry]
WITH c, count(f) AS filingsCount
RETURN c.name AS CountryName, filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Find the first 3 countries where the total amount of filings exceeds 1000000.
cypher:
MATCH (c:Country)<-[:COUNTRY]-(e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WITH c, sum(f.amount) AS totalAmount
WHERE totalAmount > 1000000
RETURN c.name AS CountryName, totalAmount
ORDER BY totalAmount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 filings where the beneficiary bank and the filer organization name are the same.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.beneficiary_bank = f.filer_org_name
RETURN f
LIMIT 3

question: Identify the top 3 filings where the originator and beneficiary banks are in the same country.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(o:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country),
      (f)-[:BENEFITS]->(b:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c)
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Identify the top 3 entities that have been the originator in the most filings.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(f:Filing)
WITH e, count(f) AS filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN e, filingsCount

question: Which 3 filings have the largest amounts and were filed between January 1, 2010, and December 31, 2015?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin >= datetime('2010-01-01T00:00:00Z') AND f.end <= datetime('2015-12-31T23:59:59Z')
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 countries where the beneficiary latitude is greater than 50 degrees.
cypher:
MATCH (c:Country)<-[:COUNTRY]-(:Entity)<-[:BENEFITS]-(f:Filing)
WHERE f.beneficiary_lat > '50'
RETURN c
LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 filings that ended in the year 2015?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.end >= datetime('2015-01-01T00:00:00Z') AND f.end <= datetime('2015-12-31T23:59:59Z')
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.end DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which 3 entities have filed the most filings that benefit entities in Germany?
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(beneficiary:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country {name: "Germany"})
WITH e, count(f) AS filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN e.name AS EntityName, filingsCount

question: Identify the top 3 filings in terms of amount that concern entities in Singapore.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:CONCERNS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country {name: "Singapore"})
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 entities based in countries with a '.uk' top-level domain.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
WHERE c.tld = '.uk'
RETURN e
LIMIT 3

question: What are the top 5 filings with the earliest begin dates?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.begin
LIMIT 5

question: Which 3 filings involve the most entities either as originators or beneficiaries?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[r:ORIGINATOR|BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)
WITH f, count(e) AS entityCount
ORDER BY entityCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN f

question: Which 3 countries have entities that have been beneficiaries in the most filings?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
RETURN c.name AS Country, count(f) AS FilingsCount
ORDER BY FilingsCount DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 filings that originated from an entity in China.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country {name: "China"})
MATCH (e)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
RETURN f

LIMIT 3

question: Which 3 filings have the longest duration from begin to end date?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin IS NOT NULL AND f.end IS NOT NULL
RETURN f, duration.between(f.begin, f.end) AS Duration
ORDER BY Duration DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 entities that have filed the most concerning filings.
cypher:
MATCH (e:Entity)-[:FILED]->(f:Filing)
WITH e, count{(f)-[:CONCERNS]->(:Entity)} AS concernsCount
ORDER BY concernsCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN e

question: Find the top 5 filings based on the number of different countries involved as either originator or beneficiary.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)
OPTIONAL MATCH (f)-[:ORIGINATOR]->(originator:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(originatorCountry:Country)
OPTIONAL MATCH (f)-[:BENEFITS]->(beneficiary:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(beneficiaryCountry:Country)
WITH f, collect(DISTINCT originatorCountry) + collect(DISTINCT beneficiaryCountry) AS countries
WITH f, size(apoc.coll.toSet(countries)) AS numCountries
ORDER BY numCountries DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN f, numCountries

question: Which 3 countries have the least number of filings ending in them?
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
WITH c, count(f) AS filingsCount
ORDER BY filingsCount ASC
LIMIT 3
RETURN c.name AS CountryName, filingsCount

question: Identify the top 3 filings with the smallest amounts that were filed in 2015.
cypher:
MATCH (f:Filing)-[:FILED]->(e:Entity)
WHERE f.begin_date_format >= '2015-01-01T00:00:00Z' AND f.end_date_format <= '2015-12-31T23:59:59Z'
RETURN f
ORDER BY f.amount ASC
LIMIT 3

question: List the first 3 entities based in 'United Kingdom' that have filed something concerning a beneficiary in 'United States'.

question: Which 3 entities have the most filings where they are both the originator and the beneficiary?

question: List the first 3 countries that have entities which have filed more than 10 filings.

question: Identify the top 5 countries by the total amount of filings originating from them.

question: Which filings involve an entity with the id 'the-bank-of-new-york-mellon-corp' as both originator and beneficiary?

question: Find characters in the top 3 louvain communities by centrality.
cypher:

WHERE c.centrality IS NOT NULL
WITH c
ORDER BY c.centrality DESC
WITH c.louvain AS community, collect(c) AS members
ORDER BY size(members) DESC
LIMIT 3
UNWIND members AS top_member
RETURN top_member.name, top_member.centrality, top_member.louvain

question: Identify the top 3 characters with the lowest pagerank but who interact in book 45.
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)-[:INTERACTS45]->(:Character)
WHERE c.pagerank IS NOT NULL
RETURN c
ORDER BY c.pagerank ASC
LIMIT 3

question: What are the names of characters with a louvain value of 1 and degree greater than 10?
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)
WHERE c.louvain = 1 AND c.degree > 10
RETURN c.name

question: Who has the highest book1BetweennessCentrality and is from community 759?
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)
WHERE c.community = 759
RETURN c.name, c.book1BetweennessCentrality
ORDER BY c.book1BetweennessCentrality DESC
LIMIT 1

question: Find 3 characters with the most diverse fastrf_embedding values (considering range between max and min in the list).
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)
WHERE c.fastrf_embedding IS NOT NULL
RETURN c.name, c.fastrf_embedding, 
       max(c.fastrf_embedding) - min(c.fastrf_embedding) AS diversity
ORDER BY diversity DESC
LIMIT 3

question: List the top 5 characters based on the sum weight of their INTERACTS1 and INTERACTS2 relationships.
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)-[r:INTERACTS1|INTERACTS2]->()
WITH c, sum(r.weight) AS totalWeight
ORDER BY totalWeight DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN c.name, totalWeight

question: Name the 3 characters with the highest INTERACTS3 relationship weight.
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)-[r:INTERACTS3]->(:Character)
RETURN c.name, r.weight
ORDER BY r.weight DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Which characters have a book45PageRank less than 1 but a book1PageRank greater than 2?
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)
WHERE c.book45PageRank < 1 AND c.book1PageRank > 2
RETURN c

question: Identify characters who have both high pagerank and high degree of centrality. Limit to top 5.
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)
WHERE c.pagerank > 5 AND c.centrality > 0.5
RETURN c
ORDER BY c.pagerank DESC, c.centrality DESC
LIMIT 5

question: What are the top 3 characters with a community number exactly 579?

question: Who are the top 5 characters based on the combination of centrality and degree?

question: Name the top 3 characters based on the sum of their book1PageRank and book45PageRank.

WHERE c.book1PageRank IS NOT NULL AND c.book45PageRank IS NOT NULL
RETURN c.name AS CharacterName, (c.book1PageRank + c.book45PageRank) AS TotalPageRank
ORDER BY TotalPageRank DESC
LIMIT 3

question: Name 3 characters from the community with the highest number of members.
cypher:
MATCH (c:Character)
WITH c.community AS community, count(c) AS members
ORDER BY members DESC
LIMIT 1
WITH community AS largestCommunity
MATCH (c:Character)
WHERE c.community = largestCommunity
RETURN c.name
LIMIT 3

question: What are the names of businesses located in Missoula?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business {city: 'Missoula'})
RETURN b.name

question: How many businesses in 'San Mateo' have been reviewed in September of any year?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business {city: 'San Mateo'})-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)
WHERE r.date.month = 9
RETURN count(DISTINCT b) AS NumberOfBusinessesReviewedInSeptember

question: Which user has the highest average star rating for their reviews and what businesses have they reviewed?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:WROTE]->(r:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(b:Business)
WITH u, avg(r.stars) AS avgStars, collect(b.name) AS businessesReviewed
ORDER BY avgStars DESC
LIMIT 1
RETURN u.name AS userName, avgStars, businessesReviewed

question: List the reviews, including text and stars, for businesses owned by 'Neo4j'.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business {name: 'Neo4j'})-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)
RETURN r.text AS ReviewText, r.stars AS Stars

question: Which businesses in 'Missoula' have received reviews with less than 4 stars?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business {city: 'Missoula'})-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)
WHERE r.stars < 4
RETURN b.name, b.address, r.stars

question: What are the business names and categories for locations on 'Broadway St'?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(c:Category)
WHERE b.address CONTAINS 'Broadway St'
RETURN b.name AS BusinessName, c.name AS Category

question: Identify all users who have reviewed businesses on 'E Front St' and the names of those businesses.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:WROTE]->(r:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(b:Business)
WHERE b.address CONTAINS 'E Front St'
RETURN u.name AS UserName, b.name AS BusinessName

question: Which categories include businesses that have been reviewed by 'Angie'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User {name: 'Angie'})-[:WROTE]->(:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(b:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(c:Category)
RETURN DISTINCT c.name

question: List all businesses with a review dated before 2016 and their corresponding review text.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)-[:REVIEWS]->(r:Review)
WHERE r.date < date('2016-01-01')
RETURN b.name, r.text

question: How many different users have reviewed 'KettleHouse Brewing Co.'?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business {name: 'KettleHouse Brewing Co.'})<-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)<-[:WROTE]-(u:User)
RETURN count(DISTINCT u) AS NumberOfUsers

question: What are the names of businesses with locations within a 1km radius of POINT(-113.995057 46.874029)?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)
WHERE distance(b.location, point({longitude: -113.995057, latitude: 46.874029})) <= 1000
RETURN b.name

question: Find the top 5 longest reviews based on text length for businesses in 'Burlingame'.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)-[:REVIEWS]->(r:Review)
WHERE b.city = 'Burlingame'
RETURN b.name, r.text, length(r.text) AS reviewLength
ORDER BY reviewLength DESC
LIMIT 5

question: Which business located in 'Missoula' has the newest review?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business {city: 'Missoula'})-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)
RETURN b.name, b.businessId, r.date
ORDER BY r.date DESC
LIMIT 1

question: List the businesses that have received at least one review with a text mentioning 'great selection'.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)
WHERE r.text CONTAINS 'great selection'

question: What businesses are located at '200 W Pine St' and what categories are they in?
cypher:

WHERE b.address = '200 W Pine St'

question: Identify businesses that have been reviewed by both 'Jenny' and 'Bob'.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)<-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)<-[:WROTE]-(u:User)
WHERE u.name IN ['Jenny', 'Bob']
WITH b, count(DISTINCT u) AS reviewersCount
WHERE reviewersCount = 2
RETURN b

question: Which user has written the most reviews for businesses in 'Missoula'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:WROTE]->(r:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(b:Business {city: 'Missoula'})
WITH u, count(r) AS reviewsCount
RETURN u.name AS UserName, reviewsCount
ORDER BY reviewsCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question: What are the addresses of businesses that have reviews with 4 stars or more and are located in 'Burlingame'?
cypher:

WHERE b.city = 'Burlingame' AND r.stars >= 4.0

question: List all categories associated with businesses in 'San Mateo'.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business {city: 'San Mateo'})-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(c:Category)
RETURN DISTINCT c.name

question: Which business has received the most reviews in 2018?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)<-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)
WHERE r.date >= date('2018-01-01') AND r.date <= date('2018-12-31')
RETURN b.name, count(r) AS reviews_count
ORDER BY reviews_count DESC
LIMIT 1

question: What are the names of all users who have reviewed 'Neo4j'?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:WROTE]->(r:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(b:Business {name: 'Neo4j'})

question: Find the top 3 highest-rated businesses in Missoula.
cypher:

ORDER BY average_rating DESC
LIMIT 3

question: How many users have written reviews for businesses located at '301 E Main St'?

MATCH (b:Business {address: '301 E Main St'})<-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)<-[:WROTE]-(u:User)

question: List the names and addresses of businesses in San Mateo that have 'Car Wash' in their category.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(c:Category)
WHERE b.city = 'San Mateo' AND c.name CONTAINS 'Car Wash'
RETURN b.name, b.address

question: Identify the businesses that have been reviewed exactly three times and list the review dates.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)<-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)
WITH b, count(r) AS reviewsCount
WHERE reviewsCount = 3
MATCH (b)<-[:REVIEWS]-(r:Review)
RETURN b.name, collect(r.date) AS reviewDates

question: What are the names of businesses in 'Burlingame' that are categorized as libraries?
cypher:

WHERE b.city = 'Burlingame' AND c.name = 'Library'

question: Which business has the oldest review and what is the text of that review?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Business)-[:REVIEWS]->(r:Review)
RETURN b.name AS BusinessName, r.text AS ReviewText
ORDER BY r.date ASC
LIMIT 1

question: List all businesses that have been reviewed by 'Will' and the corresponding categories of these businesses.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User {name: 'Will'})-[:WROTE]->(r:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(b:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(c:Category)
RETURN b.name AS BusinessName, c.name AS CategoryName

question: Which user has reviewed the most categories of businesses and what are those categories?
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[:WROTE]->(r:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(b:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(c:Category)
WITH u, collect(DISTINCT c.name) AS categories
ORDER BY size(categories) DESC
LIMIT 1
RETURN u.name AS UserName, categories AS CategoriesReviewed

question: List the businesses in 'San Mateo' that have received reviews with exactly 4 stars.

question: Identify all businesses reviewed by 'Jenny' in '2016' and list the review stars and texts.
cypher:

WHERE r.date.year = 2016
RETURN b.name AS BusinessName, r.stars AS Stars, r.text AS ReviewText

question: Which businesses on 'Broadway St' have been reviewed in 2017 and what are the reviewers' names?
cypher:
